name: Astro Bears Party
overview: A competitive party game featuring bears in space suits. Astro Bears Party is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master game about running around a planet and avoiding each other’s Magical Beary Ribbons. Jump and hover over Ribbons using a jetpack. Perform dashes to threaten your opponents. Be the last Bear standing! Choose one of 4 Bears with different playstyles and battle between 2-4 players. Take a challenge in single player mode and beat your own record in Jetfish Hunting!
